description: Mini but RuggedThe Airbender mini may be compact, but it can hold its weight in a tussle. Designed with ruggedness in mind, the Airbender Mini features a rubberized protection, providing the ultimate coverage for your iPad Mini.I'm a TransformerThe Airbender Mini is outfitted with a chrome-finished aluminum arm that allows your iPad mini to rotate a full 360 degrees for both horizontal and vertical viewing. It is also retractable & detachable allowing you to adjust your viewing angle and distance to your heart's desire.Ultra Low-Profile KeyboardWe know keyboard design. Flat-edges, chiclet keys and added width come together to create an ultra low-profile keyboard experience. On top of that, paired with the wireless power of Bluetooth allows for easy pairing and consistent connectivity form up to 10 feet away.Keyboard Specifications.Input: 5V@1ABluetooth connection: Range of 33ft or 10mDimensions: 8.2 x 5.7 x 0.9 inchesBe sure to find the official New Trent logo to ensure a 10 month warranty.
title: New Trent Airbender Mini - Rugged: Water Resistant, Dirt and Shockproof Wireless Bluetooth iPad Mini Keyboard case (upgraded version: fit Mini retina)
